projects.title: Twitter Search App
projects.description: A full-stack web application that allows the user to search for tweets either by user or by content. Built with a combination of technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, and React to create a seamless and user-friendly experience. The application also includes Twitter API integration, server-side routing, and dynamic front-end rendering that is stylized with Bootstrap.

projects.title: Star Wars App
projects.description: A React web application to display Star Wars character API data fetched from swapi.dev. The application utilizes React hooks such as useState and useEffect to manage component state. It also features a search bar component to enable users to query the Star Wars API.

projects.title: Classic Snake Game
projects.description: A basic Snake Game using HTML5 Canvas, CSS, and JavaScript. I set up arrays for the game logic to store and track the snake's position on the canvas, including collision detection and scorekeeping. I also used functions to control the snake's movement, draw objects to the canvas, and reset the game.
